scripts.phpmyadmin:start: docker stop wp-env-phpmyadmin 2>/dev/null; docker run --name wp-env-phpmyadmin --rm -d -p 8080:80 -e PMA_HOST=host.docker.internal -e PMA_PORT=$(docker port $(docker ps -q -f name="$(echo -n "$(realpath .wp-env.json)" | md5sum | awk '{print $1}')-mysql-1") 3306/tcp | awk -F':' '{print $2}') -e PMA_USER=root -e PMA_PASSWORD=password phpmyadmin
